item.name: Get version information - /version

request.description:
#### parameter list
No parameters

#### Return value
| Field Name                    |  Field type  | Parameter Description         |
| ---------------------- |:------:| ------------ |
| currentProtocolVersion | string | The co signals currently running on the network   |
| localProtocolVersion   | string | The highest supported protocol number for the current node |
| clientVersion          | string | The program version number of the current node   |

item.name: Obtain information related to this chain - /api/info

request.description:
#### parameter list
No parameters

#### Return value
| Field Name             |  Field type  | Parameter Description         |
| --------------- |:------:| ------------ |
| chainId         | string | This chain'sID        |
| assetId         | string | This chain defaults to the main asset'sID   |
| inflationAmount | string | The initial quantity of the default main asset in this chain |
| agentChainId    | string | The chain of consensus assets in this chainID   |
| agentAssetId    | string | The consensus assets of this chainID    |
| addressPrefix   | string | Prefix for this chain address       |
| symbol          | string | Main asset symbol of this chain      |

| list | list<string> | Account address |

item.name: Query block headers based on block height - /api/block/header/height/{height}

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name    | Parameter type | Parameter Description | Is it mandatory to fill in |
| ------ |:----:| ---- |:----:|
| height | long | block height |  yes   |

#### Return value
| Field Name                  |      Field type       | Parameter Description                 |
| -------------------- |:---------------:| -------------------- |
| hash                 |     string      | Blockedhashvalue             |
| preHash              |     string      | Previous block'shashvalue          |
| merkleHash           |     string      | Merkelhash              |
| time                 |     string      | Block generation time               |
| timestamp            |      long       | Block generation timestamp              |
| height               |      long       | block height                 |
| txCount              |       int       | Number of block packaging transactions             |
| blockSignature       |     string      | autographHex.encode(byte[]) |
| size                 |       int       | size                   |
| packingAddress       |     string      | Packaging address                 |
| roundIndex           |      long       | Consensus round                 |
| consensusMemberCount |       int       | Number of members participating in consensus             |
| roundStartTime       |     string      | Current consensus round start time            |
| roundStartTimestamp  |      long       | Current consensus round start timestamp           |
| packingIndexOfRound  |       int       | The ranking of the blocks packaged in the current round          |
| mainVersion          |      short      | The current effective version of the main network            |
| blockVersion         |      short      | The version of the block can be understood as the version of the local wallet   |
| stateRoot            |     string      | Smart Contract World State Root            |
| txHashList           | list<string> | Block packaged transactionshashaggregate        |

| consensusMemberCount |       int       | Number of members participating in consensus             |
| roundStartTime       |     string      | Current consensus round start time            |
| roundStartTimestamp  |      long       | Current consensus round start timestamp           |
| packingIndexOfRound  |       int       | The ranking of the blocks packaged in the current round          |
| mainVersion          |      short      | The current effective version of the main network            |

| stateRoot            |     string      | Smart Contract World State Root            |
| txHashList           | list<string> | Block packaged transactionshashaggregate        |

request.description:
#### parameter list
No parameters

| Field Name                  |      Field type       | Parameter Description                 |
| -------------------- |:---------------:| -------------------- |

| merkleHash           |     string      | Merkelhash              |
| time                 |     string      | Block generation time               |

| height               |      long       | block height                 |
| txCount              |       int       | Number of block packaging transactions             |
| blockSignature       |     string      | autographHex.encode(byte[]) |
| size                 |       int       | size                   |
| packingAddress       |     string      | Packaging address                 |
| roundIndex           |      long       | Consensus round                 |
| consensusMemberCount |       int       | Number of members participating in consensus             |

item.name: Query the latest block - /api/block/newest

request.description:
#### parameter list
No parameters

#### Return value
| Field Name                                                                                                           |      Field type       | Parameter Description                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |:---------------:| ----------------------------------------- |
| header                                                                                                        |     object      | Block header information, Only return the corresponding partial data                         |
|         hash                                                          |     string      | Blockedhashvalue                                  |
|         preHash                                                       |     string      | Previous block'shashvalue                               |
|         merkleHash                                                    |     string      | Merkelhash                                   |
|         time                                                          |     string      | Block generation time                                    |
|         timestamp                                                     |      long       | Block generation timestamp                                   |
|         height                                                        |      long       | block height                                      |
|         txCount                                                       |       int       | Number of block packaging transactions                                  |
|         blockSignature                                                |     string      | autographHex.encode(byte[])                      |
|         size                                                          |       int       | size                                        |
|         packingAddress                                                |     string      | Packaging address                                      |
|         roundIndex                                                    |      long       | Consensus round                                      |
|         consensusMemberCount                                          |       int       | Number of members participating in consensus                                  |
|         roundStartTime                                                |     string      | Current consensus round start time                                 |
|         roundStartTimestamp                                           |      long       | Current consensus round start timestamp                                |
|         packingIndexOfRound                                           |       int       | The ranking of the blocks packaged in the current round                               |
|         mainVersion                                                   |      short      | The current effective version of the main network                                 |
|         blockVersion                                                  |      short      | The version of the block can be understood as the version of the local wallet                        |
|         stateRoot                                                     |     string      | Smart Contract World State Root                                 |
|         txHashList                                                    | list<string> | Block packaged transactionshashaggregate                             |
| txs                                                                                                           | list<object> | Transaction List                                      |
|         hash                                                          |     string      | Transactionalhashvalue                                  |
|         type                                                          |       int       | Transaction type                                      |
|         time                                                          |     string      | Transaction time                                      |
|         timestamp                                                     |      long       | Transaction timestamp                                     |
|         blockHeight                                                   |      long       | block height                                      |
|         blockHash                                                     |     string      | blockhash                                    |
|         remark                                                        |     string      | Transaction notes                                      |
|         transactionSignature                                          |     string      | Transaction signature                                      |
|         txDataHex                                                     |     string      | Transaction business data serialization string                              |
|         status                                                        |       int       | Transaction status 0:unConfirm(To be confirmed), 1:confirm(Confirmed)     |
|         size                                                          |       int       | Transaction size                                      |
|         inBlockIndex                                                  |       int       | Order in blocks, stored inrocksDBThe middle is unordered, assigned values when saving blocks, sorted based on this value after retrieval |
|         from                                                          | list<object> | input                                        |
|                 address       |     string      | Account address                                      |
|                 assetsChainId |       int       | Asset issuance chainid                                  |
|                 assetsId      |       int       | assetid                                      |
|                 amount        |     string      | quantity                                        |
|                 nonce         |     string      | accountnonceValue ofHexString, prevent double flower transactions, retrieve the previous transactionhashAt the end of8Bytes  |
|                 locked        |      byte       | 0Ordinary transactions,-1Unlock amount transaction（Exit consensus, exit delegation）                 |
|         to                                                            | list<object> | output                                        |
|                 address       |     string      | Account address                                      |
|                 assetsChainId |       int       | Asset issuance chainid                                  |
|                 assetsId      |       int       | assetid                                      |
|                 amount        |     string      | quantity                                        |
|                 lockTime      |      long       | Unlocking time,-1To permanently lock                              |

item.name: Query blocks based on block height - /api/block/height/{height}

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name    | Parameter type | Parameter Description | Is it mandatory to fill in |
| ------ |:----:| ---- |:----:|
| height | long | block height |  yes   |

#### Return value
| Field Name                                                                                                           |      Field type       | Parameter Description                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |:---------------:| ----------------------------------------- |

|         hash                                                          |     string      | Blockedhashvalue                                  |
|         preHash                                                       |     string      | Previous block'shashvalue                               |
|         merkleHash                                                    |     string      | Merkelhash                                   |
|         time                                                          |     string      | Block generation time                                    |
|         timestamp                                                     |      long       | Block generation timestamp                                   |
|         height                                                        |      long       | block height                                      |
|         txCount                                                       |       int       | Number of block packaging transactions                                  |
|         blockSignature                                                |     string      | autographHex.encode(byte[])                      |
|         size                                                          |       int       | size                                        |
|         packingAddress                                                |     string      | Packaging address                                      |
|         roundIndex                                                    |      long       | Consensus round                                      |
|         consensusMemberCount                                          |       int       | Number of members participating in consensus                                  |
|         roundStartTime                                                |     string      | Current consensus round start time                                 |
|         roundStartTimestamp                                           |      long       | Current consensus round start timestamp                                |
|         packingIndexOfRound                                           |       int       | The ranking of the blocks packaged in the current round                               |
|         mainVersion                                                   |      short      | The current effective version of the main network                                 |
|         blockVersion                                                  |      short      | The version of the block can be understood as the version of the local wallet                        |
|         stateRoot                                                     |     string      | Smart Contract World State Root                                 |
|         txHashList                                                    | list<string> | Block packaged transactionshashaggregate                             |
| txs                                                                                                           | list<object> | Transaction List                                      |
|         hash                                                          |     string      | Transactionalhashvalue                                  |
|         type                                                          |       int       | Transaction type                                      |
|         time                                                          |     string      | Transaction time                                      |
|         timestamp                                                     |      long       | Transaction timestamp                                     |
|         blockHeight                                                   |      long       | block height                                      |
|         blockHash                                                     |     string      | blockhash                                    |
|         remark                                                        |     string      | Transaction notes                                      |
|         transactionSignature                                          |     string      | Transaction signature                                      |
|         txDataHex                                                     |     string      | Transaction business data serialization string                              |
|         status                                                        |       int       | Transaction status 0:unConfirm(To be confirmed), 1:confirm(Confirmed)     |
|         size                                                          |       int       | Transaction size                                      |
|         inBlockIndex                                                  |       int       | Order in blocks, stored inrocksDBThe middle is unordered, assigned values when saving blocks, sorted based on this value after retrieval |
|         from                                                          | list<object> | input                                        |
|                 address       |     string      | Account address                                      |
|                 assetsChainId |       int       | Asset issuance chainid                                  |
|                 assetsId      |       int       | assetid                                      |
|                 amount        |     string      | quantity                                        |
|                 nonce         |     string      | accountnonceValue ofHexString, prevent double flower transactions, retrieve the previous transactionhashAt the end of8Bytes  |
|                 locked        |      byte       | 0Ordinary transactions,-1Unlock amount transaction（Exit consensus, exit delegation）                 |
|         to                                                            | list<object> | output                                        |
|                 address       |     string      | Account address                                      |
|                 assetsChainId |       int       | Asset issuance chainid                                  |
|                 assetsId      |       int       | assetid                                      |
|                 amount        |     string      | quantity                                        |
|                 lockTime      |      long       | Unlocking time,-1To permanently lock                              |

| --------- |:------:| ------- |
| seed      | string | Generate random seeds |
| algorithm | string | Algorithm identification    |
| count     |  int   | Original number of seeds  |

item.name: Generate a random seed based on the height interval and return it - /api/consensus/random/seed/height

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name                                                         |         Parameter type         | Parameter Description                      | Is it mandatory to fill in |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- |:--------------------:| ------------------------- |:----:|
| RandomSeedHeightForm                                        | randomseedheightform | Random Seed Form                    |  yes   |
|         startHeight |         long         | Starting height                      |  yes   |
|         endHeight   |         long         | Cut-off height                      |  yes   |
|         algorithm   |        string        | Algorithm identification：SHA3, KECCAK, MERKLE |  no   |

#### Return value
| Field Name       |  Field type  | Parameter Description    |
| --------- |:------:| ------- |
| seed      | string | Generate random seeds |
| algorithm | string | Algorithm identification    |
| count     |  int   | Original number of seeds  |

item.name: Find the original seed list based on the maximum height and the number of original seeds, and return it - /api/consensus/random/rawseed/count

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name                                                    |          Parameter type          | Parameter Description     | Is it mandatory to fill in |
| ------------------------------------------------------ |:----------------------:| -------- |:----:|
| RandomRawSeedCountForm                                 | randomrawseedcountform | Original random seed form |  yes   |
|         height |          long          | Maximum height     |  yes   |
|         count  |          int           | Original number of seeds   |  yes   |

#### Return value
| Field Name    |      Field type       | Parameter Description |
| ------ |:---------------:| ---- |
| Original Seed List | list<string> |      |

item.name: Search for the original seed list based on the height interval and return it - /api/consensus/random/rawseed/height

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name                                                         |          Parameter type           | Parameter Description     | Is it mandatory to fill in |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- |:-----------------------:| -------- |:----:|
| RandomRawSeedHeightForm                                     | randomrawseedheightform | Original random seed form |  yes   |
|         startHeight |          long           | Starting height     |  yes   |
|         endHeight   |          long           | Cut-off height     |  yes   |

#### Return value
| Field Name    |      Field type       | Parameter Description |
| ------ |:---------------:| ---- |
| Original Seed List | list<string> |      |

item.name: Offline assembly - Create consensus node transactions - /api/consensus/agent/offline

body.raw:
{
  "agentAddress" : null,
  "packingAddress" : null,
  "rewardAddress" : null,
  "commissionRate" : 0,
  "deposit" : null,
  "input" : {
    "address" : null,
    "assetChainId" : 0,
    "assetId" : 0,
    "amount" : null,
    "nonce" : null
  }
}

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name                                                                                                          |     Parameter type     | Parameter Description       | Is it mandatory to fill in |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |:------------:| ---------- |:----:|
| ConsensusDto                                                                                                 | consensusdto | Offline creation of consensus node form |  yes   |
|         agentAddress                                                 |    string    | Node creation address     |  yes   |
|         packingAddress                                               |    string    | Node block address     |  yes   |
|         rewardAddress                                                |    string    | Obtain consensus reward address   |  yes   |
|         commissionRate                                               |     int      | Node commission ratio     |  yes   |
|         deposit                                                      |  biginteger  | Create node margin    |  yes   |
|         input                                                        |    object    | Transaction input information     |  yes   |
|                 address      |    string    | Account address       |  yes   |
|                 assetChainId |     int      | The chain of assetsid     |  yes   |
|                 assetId      |     int      | assetid       |  yes   |
|                 amount       |  biginteger  | Asset amount       |  yes   |
|                 nonce        |    string    | assetnoncevalue   |  yes   |

#### Return value
| Field Name   |  Field type  | Parameter Description     |
| ----- |:------:| -------- |
| hash  | string | transactionhash   |
| txHex | string | Transaction serialization string |

request.description:
#### parameter list
| Parameter Name                                                                                                                                                          |       Parameter type       | Parameter Description        | Is it mandatory to fill in |

|         agentAddress                                                                                                 |      string      | Node address        |  yes   |
|         deposit                                                                                                      |    biginteger    | Create margin for nodes    |  yes   |
|         price                                                                                                        |    biginteger    | Unit price of handling fee       |  no   |
|         depositList                                                                                                  | list<object>  | Stop delegation list      |  yes   |
|                 depositHash                                                  |      string      | Transactions with delegated consensushash |  yes   |
|                 input                                                        |      object      | Transaction input information      |  yes   |
|                         address      |      string      | Account address        |  yes   |
|                         assetChainId |       int        | The chain of assetsid      |  yes   |
|                         assetId      |       int        | assetid        |  yes   |
|                         amount       |    biginteger    | Asset amount        |  yes   |
|                         nonce        |      string      | assetnoncevalue    |  yes   |

| Field Name   |  Field type  | Parameter Description     |
| ----- |:------:| -------- |

| txHex | string | Transaction serialization string |
